msgPlace: Annual Report of the Project Database of the National PPP Integrated Information Platform (2018 )
shortTitle: As of the end of December 2018, there were 8,654 projects in the management database of the National Public-Private Partnerships (PPP) Integrated Information Platform, with an investment of RMB 13.2 trillion yuan.
title: Annual Report of the Project Database of the National PPP Integrated Information Platform (2018 )
txt:
Executive Summary

The following is a summary of China PPP Integrated Information Platform Management Database as of the end of December of 2018:

 

Projects in Management Database

As of the end of December 2018, there were 8,654 projects in the management database of the National Public-Private Partnerships (PPP) Integrated Information Platform, with an investment of RMB 13.2 trillion yuan. Compared with the data in the same statistic scope as that in the end of last year (hereinafter referred to as the ring growth), net increase of project is 1,517 with an investment of RMB 2.4 trillion yuan. In terms of commercial closed projects, compared with the data in the same statistic scope as that in the end of last year, net increase of commercial closed project is 1,962 with an investment of RMB 2.6 trillion yuan, a ring increase of 16.0 ppts. There are total 4,691 commercial closed projects in the management database with an investment of RMB 7.2 trillion yuan, the commercial closed rate is 54.2%. Compared with the data in the same statistic scope as that in the end of last year, net increase of projects entering construction stage is 1,078. Totally, 2,237 projects have started；construction with an investment of RMB 3.2 trillion yuan, the construction rate is 47.7%. In terms of regional distribution, compared with the data in the same statistic scope as that in the end of last year, Guangdong with 246, Shanxi with 193 and Anhui with 189 ranked top three by number of new project entries; Zhejiang, Yunnan and Guangdong ranked top three by investment amount of new project entries, respectively RMB 378.3 billion yuan, RMB 330.4 billion yuan, and RMB 326 billion yuan. Shandong (including Qingdao city) with 757, Henan with 643 and Guizhou with 514 ranked top three by accumulated number of projects in the management database; Yunnan, Guizhou and Zhejiang ranked top three by accumulated investment amount of projects in the management database, respectively RMB 1.1 trillion yuan, RMB 1 trillion yuan, and RMB 972.5 billion yuan. In terms of industrial distribution, compared with the data in the same statistic scope as that in the end of last year, municipal works with 703, ecological construction and environmental protection with 284, transportation with 228 ranked top three by the net increased number of PPP projects; integrated urban technology, transportation and municipal works ranked the top three by net increased investment amount of PPP projects, respectively RMB 674.9.1 billion yuan, RMB 664 billion yuan, and RMB 591 billion yuan. Municipal works with 3,381, transportation with 1,236, ecological construction and environmental protection with 827 ranked top three by accumulated number of projects in the management database; municipal works, transportation and integrated urban technology ranked top three by accumulated investment amount of projects in the management database, respectively RMB 4 trillion yuan, RMB 3.8 trillion yuan, and RMB 1.8 trillion yuan. In terms of return mechanism, in 2018, due to the management database cleanup, adjustment of the projects in the management database, and the investment amount of the new projects is large, the user-pay projects decreased 697 with an investment of RMB 506.8 billion yuan; the government-and-user-pay projects increased 1,791 with an investment of RMB 2.7 trillion yuan; government-pay projects increased 423 with an investment of RMB 142.8 billion yuan. In the management database, there are 626 user-pay projects with investment of RMB 1.1 trillion yuan; there are 4,721 government-and-user-pay projects with investment of RMB 8.7 trillion yuan; there are 3,307 government-pay projects with investment of RMB 3.4 trillion yuan.

 

National Demonstration Projects

As of the end of 2018, the 4 batches of national demonstration projects totaled 989 with a total investment of RMB 2.2 trillion. Commercial closed demonstration projects, compared with the data in the same statistic scope as that in the end of last year, net increase of commercial closed demonstration project is 298 with an investment of RMB 477.8 billion yuan, a ring increase of 4.8 ppts. Commercial closed projects totaled 895 with an investment of RMB 2 trillion and commercial closed rate of 90.5%; among them, 895 commercial closed demonstration projects have been started construction, with investment of RMB 1 trillion yuan, accounting for 59.0% of total. In terms of regional distribution, by the number of demonstration projects entering the implementation stage, Shandong (including Qingdao city) ranked top with 75 projects; followed by Henan (74) and Yunnan (73). Yunnan, Hebei, and Beijing ranked top three by investment amount, respectively RMB 281.9 billion yuan, RMB 208.4 billion yuan, and RMB 141.4 billion yuan. In terms of industrial distribution, municipal works with 393, transportation with 91, ecological construction and environmental protection with 86 ranked top three by the number of commercial closed demonstration projects; municipal works, transportation, and integrated urban development ranked the top three by investment amount of commercial closed demonstration project, respectively RMB 728.9 billion yuan, RMB 630.1 billion yuan, and RMB 223.6 billion yuan. In terms of private enterprise participation, there are 1,589 signed private sectors, including 39.8% of private enterprises; private enterprises participated in 467 projects with an investment of RMB 788.1 billion yuan, sharing 52.2% and 39.2% of the commercial closed defenestration projects.

 

PPP helps to make strides around China’s three priorities (namely controlling financial risk, reducing poverty and curbing pollution) and promote supply-side structural reform: the level of local governments’ fiscal expenditure responsibility. The Project Database of the National PPP Integrated Information Platform has functions of dynamically monitoring local governments’ fiscal expenditure responsibility and fiscal affordability of PPP projects. According to the monitoring data by the end of December, the fiscal expenditure responsibility of 2,503 local governments nationwide is under 10% of their fiscal affordability; more than 70% of them are below 7% (within safety intervals). There are another 5 local governments’ fiscal expenditure responsibility is higher than 10% of their fiscal affordability in some individual years. In general, the potential financial risks of PPP projects are effectively monitored and controlled. In terms of the national-level poor counties, 458 of the 832 poor counties in the country have been exploring to support poverty eradication by PPP model, accounting for 55%. There are 1,414 poverty eradication PPP projects in the management database with an investment of 1.2 trillion yuan, including 633 commercial closed projects with an investment of 567.5 billion yuan. In terms of pollution prevention and green and low-carbon projects, there are there are 4,766 projects with investment of RMB 4.7 trillion yuan in the management database. In terms of private enterprise participation, there are a total of 4,550 commercial closed projects having their social capital’s ownership information completed in the database, including 7,781 social capital and 34.9% of them are private enterprises. Private enterprises participated in 1,961 projects with an investment of 2.3 trillion yuan, sharing 43.1% and 32.5% of the 4,550 commercial closed projects. In terms of consumer sector basic public services (culture, sports, healthcare, senior care, education and tourism), there are total 1,430 projects with an investment of RMB 1.3 trillion yuan in the management database. In terms of four major economic regions, the eastern regions of the four major economic regions has the largest total number of projects (2,926) entering the management database; the projects of the western region has the highest cumulative investment amount (4.9 trillion yuan); while the eastern region has the largest number and investment of the commercial closed projects, at 1,809 and RMB 2.8 trillion yuan, respectively. In terms of the Yangtze River Economic Zone, the accelerated number of project is 3,933 with an investment of RMB 6.9 trillion, sharing 45.4% and 52.4% of the management database projects. In terms of the Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei Region, the accelerated number of project is 435 with an investment of RMB 813.4 billion, sharing 5.0% and 6.2% of the management database projects.


Projects in Pre-pipeline Database

As of the end of September, there are 3,971 projects with an investment of RMB 4.6 trillion yuan in the Pre-pipeline Database of the National PPP Integrated Information Platform.


Body text

In accordance with requirements of the Notice on Standardizing the Operation of PPP Integrated Information Platform (CJ [2015] No. 166), China PPP Integrated Information Platform and Management Database was established. The whole life-cycle of a PPP project contains five phases, respectively identification, preparation, procurement, implementation and transfer. The management database includes the PPP projects that are in the preparation, procurement, implementation and transfer phases. As of the end of 2018, the report on management database is set out as follows：

 

I. Projects in Management Database

Compared with the data in the same statistic scope as that in the end of December 2017 (hereinafter referred as ring growth), net increase of project in 2018 is 1,517 with an investment of RMB 2.4 trillion in the management database. As of the end of December 2018, there are 8,654 projects in the management database, with investment of RMB 13.2 trillion.

 

The commercial closed rate means the rate of the sum of the projects reaching implementation and transfer stages to the sum of projects in management database. Annual ring growth of the commercial closed projects are 1,962 with and investment of RMB 2.6 trillion, with a ring increase of 16.0 ppts. In 2018, the net increase of the number and investment amount of the commercial closed projects in the management database exceeded that of the net entries. There are total 4,691 commercial closed projects in the management database with an investment of RMB 7.2 trillion yuan, the commercial closed rate is 54.2%.

 

(I) The growth of the Projects in the Management Database tends to be slowing down

As of the end of 2018, there are 8,654 projects with approved Value for Money evaluation and fiscal affordability assessment, covering 31 provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities) and Xinjiang Corps and 19 sectors. Please see Figure 1-1-1 and Figure 1-1-2 for the number and investment amount from January 2018 to the end of December 2018. Due to the management database clean-up in March and April, the number of the projects decreased in these 2 months and the growth of the project tends to be slowing down since August. 


As of the end of 2018, there are 1,682 projects in the preparation phase, 2,281 in the procurement phase, and 4,691 in the implementation phase, with an investment of RMB 2.6 trillion yuan, RMB 3.4 trillion yuan, and RMB 7.2 trillion yuan respectively. See Figure 1-1-3. Currently there is no project in the transfer phase. 

(II) Management Database Cleanup and Regulate the Project Entries

In 2018, in response to the spirit of the Circular on Regulating Project Database of the National PPP Integrated Information Platform (CaiJin [2017] No.92) and the Circular on Further Regulating Management Database of the National PPP Integrated Information Platform Management (CaiZhengQiHan [2018] No.2), the local governments further regulate the examination of the new projects and contentiously remove the irregular projects. A total of 2,557 projects has been removed from the Management Database with the involved investment amount at RMB 3 trillion in 2018. There are 4,074 projects entered the management database with investment of RMB 5.8 trillion. See Figure 1-2.

 

The growth of the projects entering in the Management Database tends to be slowing down and more rationally. The development of PPP has shifted from the stage of rapid development to that of high-quality. The investment amount changes due to the restructuring of the brown projects in the management database, therefore, the result of the investment amount of the new entries projects minus the investment of the withdraw projects is not consistent with the investment amount of the net increased/decreased projects.


(III) Regional Distribution of Projects in the Management Database

By net increase of projects in 2018, Guangdong (246), Shanxi (193) and Anhui (189) ranked the top three in the list; by investment amount of project entries, Zhejiang (RMB 378.3 billion yuan), Yunnan (RMB 330.4 billion yuan) and Guangdong (RMB 326 billion yuan) ranked the top three provinces, as shown in Figure 1-3-1 and Figure 1-3-2.

By cumulative number of projects, Shandong (including Qingdao) (757), Henan (643),  and Guizhou (514) ranked the top three and accounted for 22% of total projects in the management database; by cumulative investment amount, Yunan (RMB 1.1 trillion yuan), Guizhou (RMB 1 trillion yuan) and Zhejiang (RMB 972.5 billion yuan) ranked the top three and accounted for 24% of total investment amount. Breakdowns of project and investment amount of all regions in management database by the end of 2018 are shown in Figure 1-3-3 and Figure 1-3-4.

(IV) Industrial Distribution of Projects in the Management Database

The Project Database includes a total of 19 primary industries such as energy, transportation, water conservancy, ecological construction and environmental protection, municipal works, integrated urban development, agriculture, forestry, science and technology, affordable housing, tourism, healthcare, senior care, education, culture, sports, social security, government infrastructure and others.

 

In 2018, municipal works (703), ecological construction and environmental protection (284) and transportation (228) ranked the top three by number of projects increased, as shown in Figure 1-4-1. By increase in investment amount of project entries, integrated urban development (RMB 674.9 billion yuan), transportation (RMB 664 billion yuan) and municipal works (RMB 591 billion yuan) ranked top three, as shown in Figure 1-4-2.

As of the end of 2018, the number of PPP projects and investment amounts in the management database by industry are shown in Figure 1-4-3 and Figure 1-4-4. Among them, municipal works (3,381), transportation (1,236) and ecological construction and environmental protection (827) ranked the top three by number of projects and accounted for 63% of total; municipal works (RMB 4 trillion yuan), transportation (RMB 3.8 trillion yuan), and integrated urban development (RMB 1.8 trillion yuan) ranked top three and accounted for 73.1% of total investments.

(V) The commercial closed projects

There are 4,691 commercial closed projects with an investment amount of RMB 7.2 trillion yuan, with an commercial closed rate of 54.2%, covering 30 provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities) and Xinjiang Corps except Tibet and 19 sectors. The changes in commercial closed rate of the management database from the end of 2017 to the end of 2018 are shown in Figure 1-5-1.

Breakdown of increased commercial closed projects by region. By net increase of  commercial closed projects in 2018, Guangdong (198), Zhejing (122) and Hunan (119) ranked the top three provinces. By net investment increase of commercial closed projects in 2018, Jiangsu (RMB 279.8 billion yuan), Guizhou (RMB 236.7 billion yuan) and Guangdong (RMB 226.7 billion yuan) ranked top, as shown in Figure 1-5-2 and 1-5-3.


Breakdown of accumulated commercial closed projects by region by the end of December. By number of accumulated commercial closed projects in the management database, Shandong (including Qingdao) (466) ranked the top; Anhui (305) ranked the second place, Guangdong (297) ranked the third place, accounting for 22.7% of total. By accumulated investment amount of commercial closed projects, Yunnan (RMB 584.5 billion yuan), Guizhou (RMB 542.4 billion yuan), and Jiangsu (RMB 538.8 billion yuan) ranked top three, accounting for 23.1% of total. The number of commercial closed projects and investment in various provinces are shown in Figure 1-5-4 and 1-5-5.


Commercial closed rate. There are 3 PPP projects in Shanghai and all of them reached commercial close. Shanghai ranked the first place with 100% commercial close rate; Ningxia (35/46) ranked the second place with 76.1% commercial close rate; and Xinjiang (270/365) ranked the third place with 74% commercial close rate. Please see Figure 1-5-6 for the commercial closed rate by regions in the management database by the end of December.


Ningxia, Inner Mongolia and Hunan ranked the top three by commercial closed rate rise in 2018, with a rise of 45.7%, 40.3% and 34%, respectively, as shown in Figure 1-5-7.

Breakdown of commercial closed projects by industry. By number of commercial closed projects increased in 2018, municipal works (750), transportation (280) and ecological construction and environmental protection (248) ranked top three. By investment of commercial closed projects increased in 2018, municipal works (RMB 726.9 billion yuan), transportation (RMB 625.6 billion yuan) and integrated urban development (RMB 508.4 billion yuan) ranked top three, as shown in Figure 1-5-8 and Figure 1-5-9.

Breakdown of accumulated commercial closed projects by industry. By number of accumulated commercial closed projects, municipal works (1,902), transportation (649) and ecological construction and environmental protection (460) ranked top three and accounted for 64.1% of the total. By investment of commercial closed projects, municipal works (RMB 2.4 trillion yuan), transportation (RMB 1.9 trillion yuan) and integrated urban development (RMB 1 trillion yuan) ranked top three and accounted for 73.3% of total investment, as shown in Figure 1-5-10 and Figure 1-5-11.

(VI) Nearly half of the Commercial Closed Projects Have Started Construction

2018 witness an increase of 1,078 commercial closed projects entering construction phrase. Among them, Hunan, Anhui, Guangdong ranked in the top three, respectively, 130, 121, 98. See Figure 1-6-1 for a net increase in the number of projects have started construction in each quarter of 2018. There are accumulated 2,237 projects entering construction phrase in the management database with an investment of RMB 3.2 trillion yuan, sharing 47.7% and 43.8% of the commercial closed projects in the management database respectively.

As of the end of December , Shandong (including Qingdao) with 301 projects, Anhui with 255 projects and Sichuan with 224 projects ranked in the top three by the accumulated number of the projects that have been started construction, accounting for 34.9% of the total projects that entering construction phrase; Yunnan (RMB 385.9 billion yuan), Sichuan (RMB 315.5 billion yuan) and Hunan (RMB 247.1 billion yuan) ranked top three by the investment amount of the commercial closed projects, accounting for 30% of the total investment of the projects that entering construction phrase. See Figure 1-6-2 and Figure 1-6-3.

The construction rate refers to the ratio of the number of commercial closed projects that have started construction. At the end of 2018, the construction rate of commercial closed projects was 47.7%, and rose 5.2% at the end of December from a year earlier, as shown in Figure 1-6-4.

255 out of 305 projects have started construction in Anhui, with the highest construction rate of 83.6% in the country; 224 out of 276 projects have started construction in Sichuan which ranked the second with a construction rate of 81.2%; 173 out of 236 projects have started construction in Hunan which ranked the third place with a construction rate of 73.3%. At the end of December, the construction rate by regions was shown in Figure 1-6-5.

(Ⅶ) An Analyse on Return Mechanisms

By three return mechanisms, due to the management database cleanup, adjustment of the projects in the management database, and the investment amount of the new projects is large, the user-pay projects decreased 697 with an investment of RMB 506.8 billion yuan; the government-and-user-pay projects increased 1,791 with an investment of RMB 2.7 trillion yuan; government-pay projects increased 423 with an investment of RMB 142.8 billion yuan.

 

In the management database, there are 626 user-pay projects with investment of RMB 1.1 trillion yuan, accounting for 7.2% and 8.2% of the management database respectively; there are 4,721 government-and-user-pay projects with investment of RMB 8.7 trillion yuan, accounting for 54.6% and 65.8% of the management database respectively; there are 3,307 government-pay projects with investment of RMB 3.4 trillion yuan, accounting for 38.2% and 26.1% of the management database respectively. See Figure 1-7-1 and 1-7-1. Please see Figure 1-7-3 and 1-7-4 for number and investment of projects in management database by the end of each quarter by return mechanism.

Commercial closed projects. In 2018, the number of user-pay commercial closed projects decreased 127 with an investment of RMB 33.4 billion yuan decreased. The number of VGF (i.e. government-and-user-pay) commercial closed projects increased 1,137 with an investment of RMB 1.7205 trillion yuan; the number of government-pay projects increased 952 with an investment of RMB 908.5 billion yuan. 


There are total 352 user-pay commercial closed projects with investment of RMB 483.3 billion yuan; 2,179 VGF commercial closed projects with investment of RMB 4.2827 trillion yuan; 2,160 government-pay commercial closed projects with investment of RMB 2.4345 trillion yuan. See Figure 1-11-5 and 1-11-6.

 

II. National Demonstration Projects

As of the end of December 2018, four batches of national demonstration projects totaled 989 with a total investment of RMB 2.2 trillion, covering 31 provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities) and Xinjiang Corps, and 19 industry areas. In particular, the first batch in 2014 totaled 20 (30 at first, 10 of which were subsequently excluded) with a total investment of RMB 56 billion; the second batch in 2015 totaled 158 (206 at first, 48 of which were subsequently excluded) with a total investment of RMB 454.9 billion; the third batch in 2016 totaled 425 (516 at first, 91 of which were subsequently excluded) with a total investment of RMB 923.4 billion yuan; the fourth batch totaled 386 (announced in February 2018, 396 at first, 10 of which were subsequently excluded) with a total investment of RMB 728.6 billion yuan. The commercial closed projects totaled 895 with an investment of RMB 2 trillion.

 

(I) National demonstration projects in different phases

From the end of 2017 to the end of 2018, the number and investment amount of national demonstration projects in different phases by quarters is set out in Figure 2-1-1 and Figure 2-1-2.

(II) 90% of the national demonstration projects reached commercial close

In 2018, there is an net increase of 298 commercial closed national demonstration project with an investment of RMB 477.8 billion yuan, with a ring growth of 4.8 ppts. The temporary decline of the commercial closed rate in February due to the release of the fourth batch national demonstration projects. As of the end of December, accumulated commercial closed projects totaled 895 with an investment of RMB 2 trillion and commercial closed rate of 90.5%. There are currently no projects in transfer stage. See Figure 2-2-1 for changes of the overall commercial closed rate of demonstration projects.

The first batch of the 20 demonstration projects have all reached commercial close since the end of 2016, and the second batch of 158 demonstration projects have all reached commercial close since the end of March 2017; the third batch of 425 demonstration projects have all reached commercial close since March of 2018. 292 of the fourth batch demonstration projects have reached commercial close, and the commercial closed rate is 75.6%. See Figure 2-2-2 for the commercial closed rate of each batch of the national demonstration projects.

(III) Municipal works continued to take the lead

There are 393 municipal works projects out of 865 commercial closed demonstration projects, accounting for 43.9% of the total; there were 91 transportation projects, accounting for 10.2% of the total; there were 86 ecological construction and environmental protection projects, accounting for 9.6% of the total; there were 325 remaining projects, accounting for 36.3% of total commercial closed demonstration projects. See Figure 2-3-1 and Figure 2-3-2 for number and investment of demonstration projects in each sector by the end of December.

(IV) Shandong, Henan and Yunnan ranked top three by the number of commercial closed demonstration project

According to regional statistics on commercial closed projects, Shandong (including Qingdao City) ranked the first across China with 75 national demonstration projects entered the implementation stage, followed by Henan with 74, Yunnan with 73, Hebei with 57, Anhui with 55, the remaining provinces are less than 50. Yunnan, Hebie and Beijing ranked the top three by the investment of the commercial closed demonstration projects, at RMB 281.9 billion yuan, RMB 208.4 billion yuan, and RMB 141.4 billion yuan, respectively. See Figure 2-4-1 and Figure 2-4-2.


In 2018, commercial closed demonstration project increased by 298 from the previous year. Among them, Shandong (including Qingdao) with 29, Yunnan with 24 and Henan with 21 ranked in the top three, as shown in Figure 2-4-3.


(V) Private enterprises participating in the demonstration projects reached 40%


The type of private sector. 895 commercial closed projects are composed of 456 exclusive private capital projects and 439 with a consortium led by private capital. There were 1,589 private partners signing PPP contracts, in which 633 partners were private enterprises, 42 from Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan, China, 18 from foreign countries, 855 were state-owned, and another 41 enterprises with undefined category. The private enterprises takes 39.8% of all the private partners signing PPP contracts with a ring growth of 5.2 ppts (see Figure 2-5-1).

Breakdown of sectors with private enterprises’ participation. Private enterprises participated in 467 projects with an investment of RMB 788.1 billion yuan, sharing 52.2% and 39.2% of the commercial closed projects. Private-owned and private holding partners were involved in 19 industrial sectors, as described in Figure 2-5-2 and 2-5-3. Municipal works projects (186), ecological construction and environmental protection projects (52) and senior care projects (28) ranked top three by number of projects involved with exclusive private capital. Transportation (RMB 215.4 billion), integrated urban development (RMB 172.8 billion) and municipal works (RMB 152.2 billion) ranked top three by investment amount of projects involved with exclusive private capital.

(VI) 60% of the commercial closed demonstration projects starting construction

 

As of the end of December, 585 commercial closed demonstration projects with an investment of RMB 1 trillion have been started, accounting for 59% of total. 2018 witnesses a net increase of 257 demonstration projects starting construction. Among them, Yunnan, Shandong (including Qingdao) and Anhui ranked the top three by number of projects that started construction, respectively 30, 26 and 21, see Figure 2-6-1.

 

Shandong (including Qingdao) with 59 projects ranked the first place by the number of accumulative demonstration projects that started construction; Anhui and Yunnan with 58 ranked the second; accounting for 78.7%, 96.4% and 72.6% of their commercial closed demonstration projects, respectively. Yunnan, Beijing and Shandong (including Qingdao) ranked the top three by investment amount of accumulative demonstration projects that started construction, at respectively RMB 192.9 billion, RMB 108.3 billion and RMB 76 billion, as shown in Figure 2-6-2 and Figure 2-6-3.

 

Ⅲ PPP helps to make strides around China’s three priorities (namely controlling financial risk, reducing poverty and curbing pollution) and promote supply-side structural reform

 

(Ⅰ) Local Governments’ Fiscal Expenditure Responsibility

To facilitate financial risks management, the National PPP Integrated Information Platform has developed functions of dynamically monitoring local governments’ fiscal expenditure responsibility and fiscal affordability of PPP projects. 

 

According to the monitoring data by the end of December, 2018, there are 2,508 local governments (including provincial level, municipal level, district and county level) have developed PPP projects, and the maximum fiscal expenditure responsibility of 2,503 local governments are under 10% of their fiscal affordability (hereinafter the fiscal affordability rate), which is in accordance with regulation; more than 70% of them (1,787) are below 7% in every single year, which is within safety intervals; there are another 5 local governments’ fiscal expenditure responsibility is higher than 10% of their fiscal affordability in some individual years, as a result, their new projects are forbidden to entering the management database in accordance with the requirements. In general, the potential financial risks of PPP projects are effectively monitored and controlled.

 

The total fiscal expenditure responsibility of the projects in the management database in the future 30 years (from 2018 to 2047) is RMB 16.2 trillion yuan, among them, 12.8 trillion yuan world be paid by general public budget expenditure and 3.4 trillion yuan world be paid by governmental fund. The total fiscal expenditure responsibility of the commercial closed projects is RMB 9 trillion yuan, among them, among them, 6.8 trillion yuan world be paid by general public budget expenditure and 2.2 trillion yuan world be paid by governmental fund. From the time distribution, as shown in Figure 3-1, the peak of total fiscal expenditure responsibility is in 2025, at RMB 974.5 billion yuan, among them, among them, 752.3 billion yuan world be paid by general public budget expenditure and 222.2 billion yuan world be paid by governmental fund.

(Ⅱ) PPP in Supporting Poverty Reduction of National-level Poor Counties

According to the information released by the Office of the leading group for poverty alleviation and development of the State Council, there are currently 152 national key counties and 14 special difficult linked areas for poverty reduction and development. There is a total of 832 National-level Poor Counties. As of the end of December 2018, 458 poor counties in the country have been exploring to support poverty eradication by PPP model and have PPP projects in the management database, accounting for 55% of the total National-level Poor Counties. There are 1,414 poverty eradication PPP projects in the management database with an investment of 1.2 trillion yuan, including 633 commercial closed projects with an investment of 567.5 billion yuan. At the end of December, Guizhou, Yunnan and Henan ranked the top three by number of PPP projects from National-level Poor Counties, with 269, 176 and 124 respectively; Guizhou, Yunnan and Hunan ranked the top three by investmentof PPP projects from National-level Poor Counties, at RMB 330.7 billion yuan, RMB 147.7 billion yuan and RMB 97.7 billion yuan, respectively, as shown in Figure 3-2-1 and Figure 3-2-2.


(III) Pollution Prevention, Green and Low-carbon Projects

PPP projects in a number of fields, including public transportation, water supply and drainage, ecological construction and environmental protection, water conservancy, renewable energy, education, science and technology, culture, senior care, healthcare, forestry and tourism, play a role in promoting a pollution prevention, green and low-carbon economic structure. According to such a criterion, in 2018, there were 4,766 pollution prevention, green and low-carbon projects enter the management database with investment of RMB 4.7 trillion yuan, accounting for 55.1% and 35.8% of national totals respectively. The commercial closed projects are 2,521 with an investment of RMB 2.5 trillion yuan. The number and investment amount of the pollution prevention, green and low-carbon projects by the end of December is shown in Figure 3-3.


(IV) Ownership Structure of Social Capital

The type of social capital. There are a total of 4,550 out of 4,691 commercial closed projects completing their social capital’s ownership information in the database, including 7,781 social capital and 2,713 of them are private enterprises, 116 of them are Hong Kong, Macao, Taiwan enterprises, 54 of them are foreign 4,035 of them are state-owned enterprises, and 863 of them are not easy to be attributed to the above categories, and 34.9% of them are private enterprises (see Figure 3-4-1).


Sectors involving the participation of private enterprises. There is a total of 1,961 commercial closed projects involving the participation of private enterprises, accounting for 43.1% of the total commercial closed projects; the investment of the commercial closed projects with the private capital background is 2.3 trillion yuan, accounting for 32.5% of that of the commercial closed projects.

 

There are 19 sectors involving the participation of private enterprises, as described in Figure 3-4-2 and Figure 3-4-3. Among them, municipal works projects (824), ecological construction and environmental protection projects (200) and transportation projects (151) ranked top three by number of commercial closed projects with private capital background. By investment of commercial closed projects with private capital background, municipal works (RMB 576.9 billion yuan), transportation (RMB 565.7 billion yuan) and integrated urban development (RMB 431.8 billion yuan) ranked top three.

(V) Basic public service projects in the field of consumption

The main scope of the basic public services covers culture, sports, healthcare, senior care, education, and tourism. There are total 1,430 basic public services projects with investment of RMB 1.3 trillion yuan, representing 16.5% and 9.7% of total projects and investments in management database. By the number of projects, education (418), tourism (331), and healthcare (268) ranked the top three; by investment amount, tourism (RMB 482 billion yuan), education (RMB 240.7 billion yuan), and healthcare (RMB 202.1 billion yuan) ranked the top three. See figure 3-5-1.

There are 702 basic public services projects reaching commercial close in the management database with investment of RMB 565.1 billion yuan, respectively sharing 15% and 7.8% of that in the management database. Education projects (210), healthcare projects (150) and tourism projects (139) ranked the top three by the number of projects; by investment amount, tourism (RMB 187.5 billion yuan), education (RMB 109.3 billion yuan), and healthcare (RMB 95.3 billion yuan) ranked the top three. See figure 3-5-2.

(VI) PPP Development in Four Major Economic Regions


China's four major economic regions are: the eastern region includes 10 provinces/cities, i.e. Beijing, Tianjin, Hebei, Shanghai, Jiangsu, Zhejiang, Fujian, Shandong, Guangdong and Hainan; the central region includes 6 provinces, i.e. Shanxi, Anhui, Jiangxi, Henan, Hubei and Hunan; the western region includes 12 provinces/cities, i.e. Chongqing, Sichuan, Guizhou, Yunnan, Tibet, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Ningxia, Xinjiang (Xinjiang Corps), Inner Mongolia and Guangxi; northeast region includes 3 provinces, i.e. Liaoning, Jilin and Heilongjiang. According to such a criterion, as of December 2018, the eastern regions of the four major economic regions has the largest total number of projects (2,926) entering the management database; the projects of the western region has the highest cumulative investment amount (RMB 4.9 trillion yuan); while the eastern region has the largest number and investment of the commercial closed projects, at 1,809 and RMB 2.8 trillion yuan, respectively, as shown in Figure 3-6-1 and Figure 3-6-2.



(Ⅶ) PPP in Yangtze River Economic Zone

The Yangtze River Economic Zone covers 11 provinces/cities, i.e. Shanghai, Jiangsu, Zhejiang, Anhui, Jiangxi, Hubei, Hunan, Chongqing, Sichuan, Yunnan and Guizhou. The accelerated number of project in this region is 3,933 with an investment of RMB 6.9 trillion, sharing 45.4% and 52.4% of the management database projects. By the number of projects in the management database, Guizhou (514), sichuan (513) and zhejiang (492) ranked the top three; by investment amount of the projects, Yunnan (RMB 1.1 trillion yuan), Guizhou (RMB 1 trillion yuan), and Zhejiang (RMB 979.7 billion yuan) ranked top three, as shown in Figure 3-7-1.


Anhui (305) ranked the first place by the number of commercial closed projects; followed by Sichuan (276) and Zhejiang (276); by investment amount of commercial closed projects, Yunnan (RMB 584.5 billion yuan), Guizhou (RMB 542.4 billion yuan), and Jiangsu (RMB 538.8 billion yuan) ranked the top three. See Figure 1-7-2.


(Ⅷ) PPP in Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei Region

The accelerated number of project in this region is 435 with an investment of RMB 813.4 billion, sharing 5% and 6.2% of the management database projects. The accelerated number of commercial closed project is 248 with an investment of RMB 534.9 billion, sharing 5.3% and 7.4% of the management database projects. See Figure 3-8-1 and 3-8-2.


Ⅳ Others

 

The number of projects in the Pre-pipeline Database changes in 2018. 2018 witnessed a net decrease of 3,316 projects with an investment of 2.8 trillion yuan compared with the same time last year. The Pre-pipeline Database was managed dynamically. With provincial finance departments’ approval, the projects could enter the Pre-pipeline Database. The projects would be removed from the Pre-pipeline Database with provincial finance departments’ application or while the projects entering into management database.

 

As of the end of December, there are 3,971 projects with an investment of RMB 4.6 trillion yuan in the Pre-pipeline Database of the National PPP Integrated Information Platform.

shortTitle: For the third quarter of 2018 (from July to September), increase of project entering in management database is 540 with an investment of RMB 347.1 billion yuan.
title: Quarterly Report on the Project Database of the National PPP Integrated    Information Platform 3rd Quarter of 2018
txt:
Executive Summary

The following is a summary of China PPP Integrated Information Platform Management Database as of the end of the third quarter of 2018:


Projects in Management Database

For the third quarter of 2018 (from July to September), increase of project entering in management database is 540 with an investment of RMB 347.1 billion yuan. From January to September, increase of project entering in management database is 1,152 with an investment of RMB 1.5 trillion yuan. As of the end of September, the accelerated number of project is 8,289 with an investment of RMB 12.3 trillion. In terms of commercial closed projects, the third quarter of 2018 witness an increased of 421 commercial closed projects with an investment of RMB 313.5 billion yuan; from January to September, there is an increase of 1,360 commercial closed projects with an investment of RMB 1.7 trillion yuan, the commercial closed rate increased 11.1 ppts; there are 4,089 commercial closed projects with an investment of RMB 6.3 trillion yuan, the commercial closed rate is 49.3%. In the third quarter of 2018, an increase of 174 projects have started construction with an investment of RMB 101.5 billion yuan. There are accumulated 1,860 projects have started construction in the management database with an investment of RMB 2.6 trillion yuan, the construction rate is 45.5%. In terms of regional distribution, Yunnan, Guangdong, and Jiangsu ranked the top three in terms of the number of projects entered in the management database in the third quarter, respectively 113, 107, and 63; Yunnan, Zhejiang and Jiangsu ranked the top three by investment amount of the newly entered projects, respectively, RMB 190.6 billion yuan, RMB 130.1 billion yuan and RMB 128.8 billion yuan; Shandong (including Qingdao City), Henan, and Guizhou ranked the top three by the accumulated number of projects in the management database, respectively 729, 642 and 498; Guizhou, Yunnan, and Zhejiang ranked the top three by investment amount of the total projects, respectively, RMB 972.4 billion yuan, RMB 946.3 billion yuan, and RMB 900.5 billion yuan. In terms of sector distribution, municipal works, ecological construction and environmental protection and transportation ranked top three by the number of projects entered into the management database in the third quarter of the 2018, respectively, 172, 132, and 56; integrated urban development, ecological construction and environmental protection and water conservancy ranked top three by investment amount of project entries, respectively, RMB 161.5 billion yuan, RMB 37.2 billion yuan and RMB 30.5 billion yuan. Municipal works, transportation, ecological construction and environmental protection ranked top three by total number of projects in the management database, sharing 62.3% of the total number of management database projects; municipal works, transportation, integrated urban development ranked top three by total investment, sharing 72.2% of the total investment of management database projects. In terms of private enterprise participation, there are a total of 4,018 out of 4,089 commercial closed projects completing their social capital’s ownership information in the database, including 6,753 social capital and 35.3% of them are private enterprises. Private enterprises participated in 1,711 projects with an investment of 2.1 trillion yuan, sharing 44.8% and 34% of the 4,018 commercial closed projects. In terms of consumer sector basic public services (culture, sports, healthcare, senior care, education and tourism), for the third quarter, there are total 1,409 projects with an investment of RMB 1.3 trillion yuan in the management database. In terms of pollution prevention and green and low-carbon projects, in the third quarter, there is an net increase of 326 projects with an investment of RMB 101.4 billion yuan; there are 4,519 projects with investment of RMB 4.4 trillion yuan in the management database. In terms of the Yangtze River Economic Zone (Shanghai, Jiangsu, Zhejiang, Anhui, Jiangxi, Hubei, Hunan, Chongqing, Sichuan, Yunnan, Guizhou), the accelerated number of project is 3,739 with an investment of RMB 6.3 trillion, sharing 45.1% and 51.3% of the management database projects; the accelerated number of commercial closed project is 1,780 with an investment of RMB 3.2 trillion, sharing 43.5% and 50.5% of the management database projects. In terms of the Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei Region, the accelerated number of project is 423 with an investment of RMB 782.2 billion, sharing 5.1% and 6.4% of the management database projects; the accelerated number of commercial closed project is 216 with an investment of RMB 476.3 billion, sharing 5.3% and 7.5% of the management database projects. In terms of return mechanism, in the third quarter, there is an net decrease of 92 user-pay projects with an investment of RMB 143.5 billion yuan; there is an net increase of 509 government-and-user-pay projects with an investment of RMB 513.2 billion yuan; there is an net increase of 123 government-pay projects with an investment of RMB 22.7 billion yuan. There are 623 user-pay projects with investment of RMB 915 billion yuan; there are 4,407 government-and-user-pay projects with investment of RMB 8 trillion yuan; there are 3,259 government-pay projects with investment of RMB 3.4 trillion yuan.

 

National Demonstration Projects

As of the end of September, the 4 batches of national demonstration projects totaled 990 with a total investment of RMB 2.1 trillion. Commercial closed demonstration projects, there is an net decrease of 1 commercial closed national demonstration projects with an investment of RMB 94.6 billion yuan. Decline in number and investment of projects due to commercial closed demonstration project withdrawal. The commercial closed rate of the third quarter increased 1.6 ppts compared to that of the second quarter, and increased 1.7 ppts compared to that of early 2018. From Juanary to September, there is an increase of 268 national demonstration projects with an investment of RMB 386.1 billion. As of the end of September, commercial closed projects totaled 865 with an investment of RMB 1.9 trillion and commercial closed rate of 87.4%; among them, 485 commercial closed demonstration projects have been started, with investment of RMB 937.3 billion yuan, accounting for 56.1% of total. In terms of regional distribution, by the number of commercial closed demonstration projects, Henan and Shandong (including Qingdao city) ranked top with 73 projects entering implementation stage; followed by Yunnan (63) and Anhui (55). Yunnan, Hebei, and Zhejiang ranked top three by investment amount of demonstration project, respectively RMB 267.1 billion yuan, RMB 202.6 billion yuan, and RMB 134.7 billion yuan. In terms of industrial distribution, municipal works with 380, transportation with 87, ecological construction and environmental protection with 83 ranked top three by the number of demonstration projects; municipal works, transportation, and integrated urban development ranked the top three by investment amount of demonstration project, respectively RMB 687.7 billion yuan, RMB 593.7 billion yuan, and RMB 218.7 billion yuan. In terms of private enterprise participation, there are 1,519 signed private sectors for 865 commercial closed demonstration projects, including 39.7% of private enterprises; private enterprises participated in 448 projects with an investment of RMB 750.9 billion yuan, sharing 51.8% and 39.2% of the commercial closed projects.

 

Projects in Pre-pipeline Database

As of the end of September, there are 4,181 projects with an investment of RMB 5.0 trillion yuan in the Pre-pipeline Database of the National PPP Integrated Information Platform.


Body text

In accordance with requirements of the Notice on Standardizing the Operation of PPP Integrated Information Platform (CJ [2015] No. 166), China PPP Integrated Information Platform and Management Database was established. The whole life-cycle of a PPP project contains five phases, respectively identification, preparation, procurement, implementation and transfer. The management database includes the PPP projects that are in the preparation, procurement, implementation and transfer phases. As of the third quarter of 2018, the report on management database is set out as follows：

 

I. Projects in Management Database

The third quarter witnessed an net increase of 540 projects entries in management database with an investment of RMB 347.1 billion yuan. From January to September, there is an increase of 1,152 projects in management database, with an investment of RMB 1.5 trillion yuan. As of the end of September, there are 8,289 projects in the management database, with investment of RMB 12.3 trillion.

 

Commercial closed rate, which refers to the ratio of the number of projects reaching implementation and transfer phase to the total number of projects in the management database. For the third quarter, there is an increase of 421 projects reaching commercial closed in management database, with an investment of RMB 313.5 billion yuan. From January to September, there is an increase of 1,360 commercial closed projects with an investment of RMB 1.7 trillion yuan, the commercial closed rate increased 11.1 ppts. As of the end of September, there are 4,089 commercial closed projects with an investment of RMB 6.3 trillion yuan, the commercial closed rate is 49.3%.

 

(I) The overall trend of the Projects in the Management Database shows a steady rise.

As of the end of September, there are 8,289 projects with approved Value for Money evaluation and fiscal affordability assessment, covering 31 provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities) and Xinjiang Corps and 19 sectors. Please see Figure 1-1-1 for the number of projects in the management database, and Figure 1-1-2 for investment amount from January 2017 to September 2018.

(II) The local government continues to enforce regulation of PPP Projects

For the third quarter, the local government continue to reinforce the management of the management database and remove the irregularities according to the Circular on Regulating Project Database of the National PPP Integrated Information Platform (CaiJin [2017] No.92). During the third quarter, 538 of projects with the involved investment amount at RMB 0.9 trillion yuan has been removed from the PPP Integrated Information Platform Management Database, and the quality of the projects in the management database has been improved. At the same time, there are 1,078 projects increased with investment of RMB 1.5 trillion yuan in the management database in the second quarter, covering 31 provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities) and Xinjiang Corps, which proves that PPP projects are promoted smoothly across the country. The investment amount changes due to the restructuring of the brown projects in the management database, therefore, the result of the investment amount of the new entries projects minus the investment of the withdraw projects is not consistent with the investment amount of the net increase (decrease) projects.

 

(III) Regional Distribution of Projects in the Management Database

By number of project entries in the third quarter, (113), Guangdong (107) and (63) ranked the top three in the list; by investment amounts of project entries in the third quarter, Yunnan (RMB 119.3 billion yuan), Zhejiang (RMB 130.1 billion yuan) and Jiangsu (RMB 128.8 billion yuan) ranked the top three provinces, as shown in Figure 1-3-1 and Figure 1-3-2.

 



By cumulative number of projects, Shandong (including Qingdao) (729), Henan (642),  and Guizhou (498) ranked the top three and accounted for 22.5% of total projects in the management database; by cumulative investment amount, Guizhou (RMB 972.4 billion yuan), Yunan (RMB 946.3 billion yuan) and Zhejiang (RMB 900.5 billion yuan) ranked the top three and accounted for 22.9% of total investment amount. Breakdowns of project and investment amount of all regions in management database by the second and third quarter of 2018 are shown in Figure 1-3-3 and Figure 1-3-4.


(IV) Industrial Distribution of Projects in the Management Database

During the third quarter of 2018, municipal works (172), ecological construction and environmental protection (132) and transportation (56) ranked the top three by number of projects increased, as shown in Figure 1-4-1.



By increase in investment amount of project entries during the third quarter, integrated urban development (RMB 161.5 billion yuan), ecological construction and environmental protection (RMB 37.2 billion yuan) and water conservancy (RMB 30.5 billion yuan) ranked top three, as shown in Figure 1-4-2.

The number of PPP projects and investment amounts in the management database by industry are shown in Figure 1-4-3 and Figure 1-4-4. Among them, municipal works, transportation and ecological construction and environmental protection ranked the top three by number of projects and accounted for 62.3% of total; municipal works, transportation, and integrated urban development ranked top three and accounted for 72.2% of total investments.

(V) The commercial closed projects

There is an net increase of 421 commercial closed projects with RMB 313.5 billion yuan in the management database in the third quarter, the commercial closed rate increased 2 ppts; there are 4,089 commercial closed projects with an investment amount of RMB 6.3 trillion yuan, with an commercial closed rate of 49.3%, increased 11.1 ppts compared with that at the beginning of the year, covering 30 provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities) and Xinjiang Corps except Tibet and 19 sectors. Currently there is no project in the transfer stage. The number of projects of different stages by the second and third quarter of 2018 are shown in Figure 1-5-1.


Breakdown of commercial closed projects by region. By net increase of  commercial closed projects in this quarter, Guangdong (66), Henan (34) and Jingxi (33) ranked the top three provinces and accounted for 31.6% of the total commercial closed projects increased. By net investment increase of commercial closed projects in this quarter, Guangdong (RMB 82.8 billion yuan), Zhejiang (RMB 43.6 billion yuan) and Henan (RMB 43.5 billion yuan) ranked top three and accounted for 54.2% of net investment increase in the current quarter, as shown in Figure 1-5-2 and 1-5-3.

Breakdown of commercial closed projects by region. By accumulated number of commercial closed projects in the management database, Shandong (including Qingdao) (410) ranked the top, accounting for 10.0% of total. Anhui (274) ranked the second place, Guangdong (265) ranked the third place. By accumulated investment amount of commercial closed projects, Guizhou (RMB 519.3 billion yuan), Yunnan (RMB 475.7 billion yuan), and Jiangsu (RMB 450.4 billion yuan) ranked top three. The number of commercial closed projects and investment in various provinces are shown in Figure 1-5-4 and 1-5-5.

 

Commercial closed rate. There are 2 PPP projects in Shanghai and both of them reached commercial close; Hainan (72/93) ranked the second place with 77.4% commercial close rate; and Ningxia (31/46) ranked the third place with 67.4% commercial close rate.

Breakdown of commercial closed projects by industry. By number of commercial closed projects increased in the current quarter, municipal works (131), ecological construction and environmental protection (87) and transportation (60) ranked top three and accounted for 66.0% of total commercial closed projects increased. By investment of commercial closed projects increased in the third quarter, transportation (RMB 95.6 billion yuan), municipal works (RMB 53 billion yuan) and ecological construction and environmental protection (RMB 32.6 billion yuan) ranked top three and accounted for 57.8% of total investment, as shown in Figure 1-5-6 and Figure 1-5-7.

Breakdown of accumulated commercial closed projects by industry. By number of commercial closed projects, municipal works (1,651), transportation (564) and ecological construction and environmental protection (410) ranked top three and accounted for 64.2% of total commercial closed projects. By investment of commercial closed projects, municipal works (RMB 2.1837 trillion yuan), transportation (RMB 1.5751 trillion yuan) and integrated urban development (RMB 860.7 billion yuan) ranked top three and accounted for 73.2% of total investment, as shown in Figure 1-5-8 and Figure 1-5-9.


(VII) Ownership Structure of Social Capital

The type of social capital. There are a total of 4,018 out of 4,089 commercial closed projects completing their social capital’s ownership information in the database, including 6,753 social capital and 2,383 of them are private enterprises, 134 of them are Hong Kong, Macao, Taiwan enterprises, 33 of them are foreign 3,443 of them are state-owned enterprises, and 760 of them are not easy to be attributed to the above categories, and 35.3% of them are private enterprises (see Figure 1-6-1).

Sectors involving the participation of private enterprises. There is a total of 1,799 commercial closed projects involving the participation of private enterprises, including non-consortia and consortia (that is, with private capital background), accounting for 44.8% of 4,018 commercial closed projects that have their social capital’s ownership information completed in the database; the investment of the projects with the private capital background is 2.1 trillion yuan, accounting for 34%.


Private-owned and private holding partners were involved in 19 industrial sectors, as described in Figure 1-6-2 and Figure 1-6-3. Among them, municipal works projects (729), ecological construction and environmental protection projects (198) and transportation projects (139) ranked top three by number of commercial closed projects. By investment of commercial closed projects, municipal works (RMB 567 billion yuan), transportation (RMB 438.9 billion yuan) and integrated urban development (RMB 397.1 billion yuan) ranked top three.


(VI) Basic public service projects in the field of consumption

The main scope of the basic public services covers culture, sports, healthcare, senior care, education, and tourism. There are total 1,409 basic public services projects with investment of RMB 1.27 trillion yuan, representing 17.0% and 10.3% of total projects and investments in management database. By the number of projects, education (410), tourism (334), and healthcare (258) ranked the top three; by investment amount, tourism (RMB 495.3 billion yuan), education (RMB 233.5 billion yuan), and healthcare (RMB 197.2 billion yuan) ranked the top three. See figure 1-7-1.

 

There are 619 basic public services projects reaching commercial close in the management database with investment of RMB 503.8 billion yuan, respectively sharing 15.1% and 8.0% of that in the management database. Education projects (182), healthcare projects (131) and tourism projects (122) ranked the top three by the number of projects; by investment amount, tourism (RMB 168.7 billion yuan), education (RMB 96.7 billion yuan), and healthcare (RMB 80.2 billion yuan) ranked the top three. See figure 1-7-2.



(VIII) Pollution Prevention, Green and Low-carbon Projects

PPP projects in a number of fields, including public transportation, water supply and drainage, ecological construction and environmental protection, water conservancy, renewable energy, education, science and technology, culture, senior care, healthcare, forestry and tourism, play a role in promoting a pollution prevention, green and low-carbon economic structure. According to such a criterion, in the third quarter, the net project entries increase was 326 with a net investment increase of RMB 101.4 billion yuan. There were 4,519 pollution prevention, green and low-carbon projects enter the management database with investment of RMB 4.4 trillion yuan, accounting for 54.5% and 36.0% of national totals respectively. The increased commercial closed projects are 202 with an investment of RMB 62.7 billion yuan. The accumulated commercial closed projects are 2,193 with an investment of RMB 2.3 trillion yuan. The comparison of the pollution prevention, green and low-carbon projects of the second and third quarter of 2018 is shown in Figure 1-8-1 and Figure 1-8-2.


(Ⅸ) Yangtze River Economic Zone projects

The Yangtze River Economic Zone covers 11 provinces and cities, i.e. Shanghai, Jiangsu, Zhejiang, Anhui, Jiangxi, Hubei, Hunan, Chongqing, Sichuan, Yunnan and Guizhou. The accelerated number of project in this region is 3,739 with an investment of RMB 6.3 trillion, sharing 45.1% and 51.3% of the management database projects. By the number of projects in the management database, Guizhou (498), sichuan (477) and zhejiang (459) ranked the top three; by investment amount of commercial closed projects, Guizhou (RMB 972.4 billion yuan), Yunnan (RMB 946.3 billion yuan), and Zhejiang (RMB 900.5 billion yuan) ranked top three, as shown in Figure 1-9-1.


The accelerated number of commercial closed project in this region is 1,780 with an investment of RMB 3.2 trillion, sharing 43.5% and 50.5% of the management database projects. Anhui (274), Zhejiang (248) and Hunan (237) ranked the top three by the number of commercial closed projects; by investment amount, Guizhou (RMB 519.3 billion yuan), Yunnan (RMB 475.7 billion yuan), and Jiangsu (RMB 450.4 billion yuan) ranked the top three. See Figure 1-9-2.


(X) Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei Region Projects

The accelerated number of project in this region is 423 with an investment of RMB 782.2 billion, sharing 5.1% and 6.4% of the management database projects. The accelerated number of commercial closed project is 216 with an investment of RMB 476.3 billion, sharing 5.3% and 7.5% of the management database projects. See Figure 1-10-1 and 1-10-2. 



(Ⅺ) An Analyse on Return Mechanisms

By three return mechanisms, the number of user-pay projects in the third quarter decreased 92 with an investment amount of RMB 143.5 billion yuan; the number of VGF projects increased 509 with an investment amount of RMB 513.2 billion yuan; the number of government-pay projects increased 123 with an decreased investment amount of RMB 22.7 billion yuan, see Figure 1-11-1and 1-11-2.



There are 623 user-pay projects with investment of RMB 915 billion yuan, accounting for 7.5% and 7.4% of the management database respectively; 4,407 VGF (i.e. government-and-user-pay) projects with investment of RMB 8 trillion, accounting for 53.2% and 65% of the management database respectively; 3,259 government-pay projects with investment of RMB 3.4 trillion, accounting for 39.3% and 27.6% of the management database respectively. See Figure 1-11-3 and 1-11-4.


Commercial closed projects. In the third quarter, the number of user-pay commercial closed projects decreased 14 with an investment of RMB 21 billion yuan decreased. The number of VGF commercial closed projects increased 249 with an investment of RMB 188 billion yuan; the number of government-pay projects increased 186 with an investment of RMB 127.6 billion yuan.

 

There are 331 accumulated user-pay commercial closed projects with investment of RMB 427.7 billion yuan; 1,864 VGF (i.e. government-and-user-pay) commercial closed projects with investment of RMB 3.7 trillion yuan; 1,894 government-pay commercial closed projects with investment of RMB 2.2 trillion yuan. See Figure 1-11-5 and 1-11-6.


(Ⅻ) Nearly half of the Commercial Closed Projects Have Started Construction

The third quarter of 2018 witness an increased of 174 commercial closed projects entering construction phrase, with an investment of RMB 101.5 billion yuan; there are accumulated 1,860 projects entering construction phrase in the management database with an investment of RMB 2.6 trillion yuan, sharing 45.5% and 40.5% of the projects in the management database respectively.

 

Shandong (including Qingdao) has started 261 projects, accounting for 63.7% of the total number of commercial closed projects in the province; 190 have been started in Sichuan, accounting for 80.5% of the total number in the province; 190 have been started in Anhui, accounting for 69.3% of the total number in the province;Yunnan (RMB 314.1 billion yuan), Hunan (RMB 268.1 billion yuan) and Sichuan (RMB 215.4 billion yuan) ranked top three by the investment amount of the commercial closed projects. See Figure 1-12-1 and Figure 1-12-2.



II. National Demonstration Projects

For the third quarter, four batches of national demonstration projects totaled 990 with a total investment of RMB 2.1 trillion, covering 31 provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities) and Xinjiang Corps, and 19 industry areas. In particular, the first batch in 2014 totaled 20 (30 at first, 10 of which were subsequently excluded) with a total investment of RMB 56 billion; the second batch in 2015 totaled 158 (206 at first, 48 of which were subsequently excluded) with a total investment of RMB 427.1 billion; the third batch in 2016 totaled 426 (516 at first, 90 of which were subsequently excluded) with a total investment of RMB 929.6 billion yuan; the fourth batch totaled 386 (announced in February 2018, 396 at first, 10 of which were subsequently excluded) with a total investment of RMB 725.9 billion yuan. The commercial closed projects totaled 865 with an investment of RMB 1.9 trillion.

 

(I) National demonstration projects in different phases

For the second and third quarter of 2018, the number and investment amount of projects in different phases is set out in Figure 2-1-1 and Figure 2-1-2.

(II) 80% of the national demonstration projects reached commercial closed

For the third quarter of 2018, there is an net increase of 1 commercial closed national demonstration project with an investment of RMB 94.6 billion yuan. The decline of the number and investment of the projects due to the quit of the commercial closed national demonstration projects. As of the end of September, commercial closed projects totaled 865 with an investment of RMB 1.9 trillion and commercial closed rate of 87.4%. There are currently no projects in transfer stage. See Figure 2-2-1 for changes of the overall commercial closed rate of demonstration projects.


The first batch of the 20 demonstration projects have all reached commercial close since the end of 2016, and the second batch of 158 demonstration projects have all reached commercial close since the end of March 2017; the third batch of 426 demonstration projects have all reached commercial close in this month. 261 of the fourth batch demonstration projects have reached commercial close, and the commercial closed rate is 67.6%. See Figure 2-2-2 for the commercial closed rate of each batch of the national demonstration projects.

(III) Municipal works continued to take the lead

The Project Database includes a total of 19 primary industries such as energy, transportation, water conservancy, ecological construction and environmental protection, municipal works, integrated urban development, agriculture, forestry, science and technology, affordable housing, tourism, health-care, senior care, education, culture, sports, social security, government infrastructure and others. The demonstration projects and commercial closed demonstration projects cover all the 19 sectors.


There are 380 municipal works projects out of 865 commercial closed demonstration projects, accounting for 43.9% of total commercial closed demonstration projects; there were 87 transportation projects, accounting for 10.1% of total commercial closed demonstration projects; there were 83 ecological construction and environmental protection projects, accounting for 9.6% of total commercial closed demonstration projects; there were 315 remaining projects, accounting for 36.4% of total commercial closed demonstration projects. See Figure 2-3-1 for breakdown of demonstration projects in different sectors of the the third quarter. The comparison of the number of demonstration projects in each sector and the number of commercial closed projects is shown in Figure 2-3-2.


(IV) Shandong, Henan and Yunnan ranked top three by the number of commercial closed demonstration projects

According to regional statistics on commercial closed projects, Henan and Shandong (including Qingdao City) ranked the first across China with 73 national demonstration projects entered the implementation stage, followed by Yunnan with 63, Anhui with 55, Hebei with 54, the remaining provinces are less than 50. See Figure 2-4 for the comparison of the number of demonstration projects and the number of commercial closed of different province.



(V) Private enterprises participating in the demonstration projects reached 40%

The type of private sector. 865 commercial closed projects are composed of 446 exclusive private capital projects and 419 with a consortium led by private capital. There were 1,519 private partners signing PPP contracts, in which 603 partners were private enterprises, 39 from Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan, China, 18 from foreign countries, 818 were state-owned, and another 41 enterprises with undefined category. The private enterprises takes 39.7% of all the private partners signing PPP contracts with a ring growth of 0.3 ppts (see Figure 2-5-1).


 

Fields with private enterprises’ participation. Private enterprises participated in 448 projects with an investment of RMB 750.9 billion yuan, sharing 51.8% and 39.2% of the commercial closed projects. Private-owned and private holding partners were involved in 19 industrial sectors, as described in Figure 2-5-2 and 2-5-3. Municipal works projects (179), ecological construction and environmental protection projects (50) and senior care projects (27) ranked top three by number of projects involved with exclusive private capital. Transportation (RMB 190.8 billion), integrated urban development (RMB 167.8 billion) and municipal works (RMB 149.3 billion) ranked top three by investment amount of projects involved with exclusive private capital.


 

(VI) Shandong takes the lead on the number of commercial closed demonstration projects that started construction

As of the end of September, 485 commercial closed demonstration projects have been started, accounting for 56.1% of total. Shandong (including Qingdao), Anhui, and Yunnan ranked the top three by number of projects that started construction, respectively 55, 51 and 45, these three provinces accounted for 75.3%, 92.7%, and 71.4% of the number of the commercial closed demonstration projects. Yunnan, Beijing and Anhui ranked the top three by investment amount of projects that started construction, respectively RMB 168.4 billion, RMB 78.8 billion and RMB 74.6 billion. As shown in Figure 2-6-1 and 2-6-2.

 

III  Others

As of the end of September, there are 4,181 projects with an investment of RMB 5.0 trillion yuan in the Pre-pipeline Database of the National PPP Integrated Information Platform.
